ActMinistries and Ministers of State Act
SubjectOrder Assigning the Honourable Ginette Petitpas Taylor, Minister of State (Official Languages) and Minister Responsible for the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency, to Assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage
PrecisOrder assigning the Honourable GINETTE PETITPAS TAYLOR, Minister of State (Official Languages) to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage in the carrying out of that Minister’s responsibilities.
